title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
summary: Enhance login security through multi-factor authentication for all banking portal users.
description: Implement a secure authentication mechanism that uses multiple identity verification factors such as passwords, OTPs, or biometrics. Ensure compliance with financial data security regulations and safeguard user credentials through encryption and token-based authentication methods. Provide adaptive MFA options, detect suspicious login behavior, and include password recovery and device management features to improve user trust and safety.

title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
summary: Provide a real-time, personalized dashboard displaying customer-specific financial data and services.
description: Design and develop a dashboard that dynamically displays real-time account information, recent transactions, and personalized banking offers based on customer profiles. Integrate data analytics to identify customer preferences and showcase relevant products. The dashboard should provide quick access to frequent actions such as transfers and payments, while ensuring responsive design and efficient data synchronization with backend systems.

title: Responsive Multi-Device Portal Interface
summary: Develop a responsive, accessible web and mobile interface for a seamless user experience.
description: Create a unified user interface that adapts seamlessly across desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Implement responsive design principles, fast load times, and streamlined navigation. Ensure accessibility compliance with WCAG standards, offering intuitive interactions for all users, including those with disabilities. The UI should deliver a consistent banking experience across all platforms and browsers.

title: Digital Account Opening and Self-Service Requests
summary: Enable users to digitally open new accounts and submit service requests online.
description: Implement fully digital workflows that allow customers to open new accounts, apply for additional products, and request service modifications. Automate KYC verification, incorporate e-signature integration, and streamline validation processes. Provide intuitive progress indicators, form pre-filling, and secure submission mechanisms to reduce process time and eliminate the need for physical branch visits.

title: Save and Resume Customer Applications
summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications or requests and continue later from any device.
description: Implement a secure mechanism for saving incomplete forms and requests to ensure customer convenience during lengthy application processes. Data should be encrypted and recoverable upon re-login. Include features such as automatic draft saving, progress tracking, and alerts about incomplete applications. This ensures minimal effort for customers to complete their banking workflows without losing data.

title: Secure Document Upload and Review
summary: Enable customers to upload and manage required documents securely as part of workflows.
description: Develop a high-security document upload functionality for identity verification, income proof, and service requests. Support common file formats, enforce secure storage with encryption, and implement malware and file-type validation. Include automated checks and integration with service workflows to trigger validation and approval steps promptly, reducing manual effort and ensuring compliance with internal security standards.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time updates and notifications on account and service request statuses.
description: Implement a system that updates users instantly on the status of their submitted requests or applications. Use event-driven alerts through in-dashboard notifications, emails, or SMS to notify customers about key progress steps or required actions. Ensure end-to-end transparency and improved user engagement by keeping customers informed throughout the lifecycle of their digital interactions.

title: Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain a secure log of all user interactions and actions for compliance and transparency.
description: Create an immutable audit system that captures all user and system-level activities, including login events, account operations, and form submissions. Provide customers access to a summarized view of their history while preserving detailed logs for regulatory audits. Ensure logs are encrypted, timestamped, and securely stored to maintain compliance with internal and regulatory standards.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the digital portal with the bankâ€™s core systems for seamless data synchronization.
description: Develop an integration framework that connects the digital self-service portal with the core banking system. Implement RESTful APIs and middleware for real-time synchronization of customer profiles, account balances, and service transactions. Include data validation, error handling, and load balancing to guarantee reliable, high-performance communication between the front-end and backend banking systems.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement strict permission-based access controls for users and administrators.
description: Develop a role-based access control system defining user and staff roles to manage feature visibility and data accessibility. Enforce least-privilege principles to limit access to sensitive operations. Integrate this system with identity providers for authentication and authorization, maintain audit logs for access events, and allow easy updates to user permissions as per operational and compliance needs.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Deploy an independent, high-performance database architecture to support the banking portal.
description: Implement a robust, scalable database infrastructure tailored for portal operations and customer data handling. Optimize queries, caching, and indexing for faster processing of transactions and workflows. Enforce data encryption, implement automated backup and recovery systems, and introduce monitoring dashboards to maintain performance and ensure operational continuity in high-traffic scenarios.
